DrmROStoreSingleton Class Reference
[Digital Rights Management]

Protected Member Functions

 DrmROStoreSingleton ()
virtual ~DrmROStoreSingleton ()

Detailed Description

When the static Instance() method is called for the first time, the singleton object is created. Every sequential call returns a reference to this instance. The class instance can be destroyed by calling the DestroyInstance() method.

DestroyInstance -- Destroys the only instance. IMPORTANT : Call it as a last step and avoid dangling references
